product_name: La Roche-PosayVitamin C Brightening Facial Cleanser
summary: SummaryDiscover La Roche Posay's Vitamin C Brightening Facial Cleanser. Foaming gel cleanses and purifies to leave skin appearing brighter, more even, and smoother.
details: DetailsBenefitsVitamin C face wash powered by Vitamin Cg & Vitamin B3, works as a brightening cleanser to gently remove dirt & impurities for a radiant complexionMulti-Purpose Foaming Cleanser for Daily Use: Addresses multiple concerns such as lack of radiance, uneven skin texture & toneDermatologist tested & suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skinParaben-Free, Soap-Free, & Sulfate-FreeKey IngredientsVitamin Cg: A powerful antioxidant that brightens and evens skin toneVitamin B3: Soothes and calms skin, reducing redness and irritation while supporting a healthy skin barrier.Research Results94% agree skin feels soft94% agree skin feels fresh upon use87% agree skin is visibly more radiant*Self-assessment, 69 subjects, after 28 daysItem 2640391How To UseStep 1: Apply to wet skin.Step 2: Massage gently and rinse off.Step 3: After cleansing, use Vitamin C12 Serum (normal/dry skin) or Vitamin C12 Oil Control Serum (oily/combination skin).Precautions: In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Coco-Betaine, Propanediol, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Peg-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Ceramide Np, Niacinamide, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Disodium Edta, Hydroxyacetophenone, Capryloyl Glycine, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Pentylene Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Tocopherol, Parfum / Fragrance (F.I.L. N70057544/1).
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply to wet skin.Step 2: Massage gently and rinse off.Step 3: After cleansing, use Vitamin C12 Serum (normal/dry skin) or Vitamin C12 Oil Control Serum (oily/combination skin).Precautions: In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly.

reviews.headline: I love this cleanser
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love this cleanser; it leaves my face feeling fresh. It's a good price for the quantity included, as you only need a small amount for a single wash. I notice an improvement in the dark spots on my face. The smell is Very lite

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The packaging is so sleek and simple I do love it. My skin tends to be more on the dry side with an oily T-zone. I will say I love the feel and way my face feels after washing. I will say I've been using for about a week going on 2 and I'm having some extreme dry patches around my chin and neck as well as sides of my face. I would keep that in mind if you also tend to have dry skin.

reviews.headline: Very Good
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have been using this face wash for the last few months and I have really been enjoying it! It does not feel like it strips my skin but my face still feels super clean! I have how well it lathers as well! No offensive smell or anything! Would totally repurchase!

reviews.headline: Daily cleanser
reviews.comments:
La roche posey cleanser never disappoints but i really like this version. When used the product consistently, you can see the skin brighten. The consistency is not to thick, gentle with all skin type (im combination and my boyfriend is dry/prone to acne). 
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]

reviews.headline: Recommend
reviews.comments: I mean what can i say im a guy i dont usually use this type of product but I do got to say it works over all my face feels smoother and it looks cleaner ? I mean I can tell theres definitely chances for the better

reviews.headline: Gentle and effective
reviews.comments: My skin is brighter soft and with no breakouts. It is gentle and smells amazing. Easy to pump out and a little goes a long way. Value for money. Love

reviews.headline: I love it, so far so good!
reviews.comments: So far, so good :)

reviews.headline: Really nice vitamin c cleanser
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]. La Roche Posay hardly ever disappoints me and this vitamin c brightening cleanser is no different. This cleanser is very gentle but for me it's quite effective and leaves my skin feeling refreshed and noticeably brighter. 

I really like how the formula combines vitamin c  with salicylic acid which helps to exfoliate. The scent of this cleanser is extremely subtle with a slight citrus and it lathers very well.

reviews.headline: Easy to implement in the skin care routine, visibly brighten
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This cleanser was super easy to implement into my skincare routine and has visibly brightened my skin and its texture. Feels nice on my face and isn't too scented either

reviews.headline: Totally
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for about two weeks. I've noticed my skin looks glowy. My good friend complimented me asked if I got facial. She said my skin looks polished shinny in a good way.

reviews.headline: Easy on the Skin cleanser
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This cleanser worked well in the shower and was easy on my skin. It isn't too fragrant and has a pleasant scent. It lathers and you don't need a lot to get that clean feeling.

reviews.headline: Sudsy Citrus
reviews.comments: I received this item for free to honestly review, and I appreciated the gorgeous scent and generous lather.  Really uplifting and bright.  My skin felt clean, too!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Makes my skin feel very hydrated and smooth and ready for the day in the morning and is perfect for my nighttime routine after a long day. The scent is refreshing and not too fragrant.

reviews.headline: My new nighttime staple.
reviews.comments: Love this product. It's so smooth and effective. Perfect to starting my day in the morning. It's not too fragrant and very easy on the skin. Keeps my skin hydrated and ready to start my day as well as keeping it hydrated at night when I use it before bed.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser option from LRP
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I am really into vitamin c right now as I am going for a more even skin tone. It's great to include this powerhouse ingredient in my cleanser. This has been fab! I love and trust La Roche Posay and this has been a seamless addition to my skincare routine.

reviews.headline: Luminous and smells great
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I enjoy how luminous this product makes my skin, its a great cleanser for that purpose, but I personally broke out a bit from using this and didnt see any long term results.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really enjoy using this cleanser for my morning cleanse. I need a small amount to get a very satisfying lather. The scent is subtle and very pleasant, not overpowering. My skin is left feeling cleansed and not dry. It appears bright for sure.  I will definitely be purchasing this cleanser after I finish my bottle. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. Simple formula that leaves skin feeling clean and looking bright and radiant. No overwhelming scents. I use to fix dark spots and hyperpigmentation. The packaging size is worth the price.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this again
reviews.comments: Burns my skin , I assume it was good for sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Not good
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really wanted to love this face wash, but I didn't. I didn't like the way it left my skin feeling, it felt stripped and dry. It didn't do a very good job at cleaning either. I haven't broke out in years, but this changed all that for me. The only thing it had going for it was it smelled pleasant. I would not purchase this again.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product in exchange for my honest review The La Roche-Posay Vitamin C Brightening Cleanser is a well-formulated skincare product designed to deliver both a gentle cleansing experience and visible brightening benefits. Backed by dermatological research and the trusted reputation of La Roche-Posay, this cleanser appeals to those looking to combat dullness, uneven skin tone, and early signs of aging while keeping their skincare routine simple and effective.

Packaging & First Impressions

Packaged in a sleek, easy-to-use tube, the cleanser reflects the brand's minimalist and clinical aesthetic. The product is lightweight, making it ideal for both daily use at home and travel. At first glance, it offers the promise of brightness and claritythanks to the prominent mention of Vitamin C, a hero ingredient in skincare for its antioxidant and complexion-enhancing properties.

Fragrance:
It has a mild citrus scent that smells fresh and energizing but isn't overpowering or irritating, even for sensitive skin.

Skin Type Compatibility:
Suitable for normal to oily skin types. Those with dry or sensitive skin may want to follow up with a hydrating moisturizer, especially during colder months.

Texture & Application:
The cleanser has a lightweight, gel-like consistency that lathers into a soft foam. It spreads easily on damp skin and rinses off cleanly without leaving any residue or tightness. Just a dime-sized amount is enough for the whole face
faceoff_positive.headline: Brightening Clenser

faceoff_negative.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review.] 

I was so excited for this cleanser since I've been wanting something to keep in my shower on the days that I need a morning cleanser (I have a different routine for night time), but I was kind of disappointed. This cleanser has a strong scent and it almost smells like sunscreen. It lathers nicely, but my face feels stripped after using it so I wasn't too thrilled about that since I already have dry and dehydrated skin. It claims to have Vitamin B3 to help with soothing the skin and helping restore the skin's moisture barrier but I didn't really feel like it helped with that. In the long run, you'd have to use a cleanser for a long time to see results in fading hyperpigmentation without the help of serums and treatments, so I wouldn't necessarily say this would be the best product to fade marks. Oily skin people might like this one though, it just wasn't for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Stripping for dry skin.
